title: Add --numeric-ids flag
description: Preserve uid/gid numerically instead of mapping by name. Required for container backups (subuid/subgid). GitHub #12.

title: Add --one-file-system flag
description: Prevent crossing mount boundaries during sync. Standard rsync -x feature. Check st_dev during scan. GitHub #12.

title: SSH client arguments support
description: Allow custom SSH options (port, identity file, ProxyCommand). Research best CLI UX - rsync uses -e, others may differ. GitHub #12.

title: Benchmark SSH performance vs rsync
description: Validate server mode performance vs rsync over SSH before claiming parity. Architecture is sound (pipelined binary protocol) but unverified. Test: fresh transfers, delta sync, many small files.

title: russh migration
description: Pure Rust SSH. Blocked on SSH agent (~300 LOC custom protocol)

title: S3 bidirectional sync
description: Currently S3 is experimental and one-way

title: Server mode Phase 5: Progress reporting, hardlinks, xattrs
Windows support
description: Sparse files, ACLs, path edge cases
